content: of the ear edges together see photo pull the end to the inside and trim reattach the yarn in between the ears leaving a 6 inch end on the outside of the head this end will be used later place the 12 stitches from the stitch holder or waste yarn onto 3 double pointed needles 4 sts per needle repeat as for the first ear finish stuffing the head do not stuff the bunny ears place the end from the reattached yarn on a yarn needle and take a few stitches to close the gap in between the ears pull the end to the inside and trim to stay inside place a length of ice cream on a yarn needle and whipstitch the head to the top of the body pull the end to the inside and trim bunny tail with ice cream make a 1 inch pom pom with 50 wraps attach at the lower back of the body attach the tail last and place to assure that rabbit can stand up on its own face use the black embroidery floss and the yarn needle to stitch the face take straight stitches to make the eyes and nose pull the ends to the inside and trim use the photo as a guide © 2012 this pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way spud and chloë and the spud and chloë characters are trademarks and copyrights of blue sky alpacas increase 013012
